channel.title: Server Login Error
channel.description: When I try to log in I get this. ------------------------------------------------- Launching Regicide... Saved all games. Server listening on port 127.0.0.1:43594 Xmbrockstar has logged into Regicide. Game saved for player xmbrockstar [DEREGISTERED] Xmbrockstar has logged out. ------------------------------------------------ and in the client when I log in it just says Connection Lost.

item.title: Server Login Error
item.dc:creator: @santa1428 santa1428
item.description:
@santa1428 wrote:

When I try to log in I get this.

Launching Regicideâ€¦
Saved all games.
Server listening on port 127.0.0.1:43594
Xmbrockstar has logged into Regicide.
Game saved for player xmbrockstar
[DEREGISTERED] Xmbrockstar has logged out.

and in the client when I log in it just says Connection Lost.

Read full topic
